trans-unit.source: The VlvRequestControl class is used to request virtual list view (VLV) support from the server.
The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class.
The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and target entry.
The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the results.
The target entry for the search.
The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and offset.
The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to send back in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to send back in the results.
The ratio between the offset value and the content count.
The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and target entry.
The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the results.
The target entry for the search.
The AfterCount property specifies the number of entries after the target entry to return in the list results.
The number of entries after the target entry to return in the list results.
The BeforeCount property specifies the number of entries before the target entry to return in the list results.
The number of entries before the target entry to return in the list results.
The ContextId property contains the context ID assigned by the server to identify this search operation.
The context ID assigned by the server to identify this search operation.
The EstimateCount property contains the content count of the list.
The content count of the list.
The GetValue method returns a BER-encoded sequence that specifies the control.
A BER-encoded sequence that specifies this control.
The Offset property contains the offset value of the target entry.
The offset value of the target entry.
The Target property contains the target entry of the search.
The target entry of the search.
